alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox; Peoria (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Fulton, southern Knox and southwestern Peoria Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 345 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Galesburg, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Galesburg, Canton, Lewistown, Abingdon, Knoxville, Farmington, Elmwood, Cuba, Hanna City, Trivoli, Yates City, St. David, Fairview, London Mills, Maquon, Gilson, East Galesburg, Dunfermline, Smithfield and Bryant. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 48 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
